title: Biscuits, Cookies & Brownies
description: In this collection, you will find tempting treats to suit all tastes. There are savoury biscuits, perfect for morning tea or with drinks before dinner; classic favourites, such as melting moments and chocolate chip cookies, a selection of wonderful shortbreads, and some simply scrumptious family-style biscuits.Chocoholics are catered for with a whole section of irresistible delights. Included are clear step-by-step photographs for all the recipes, practical hints on equipment and preparation methods, as well as lots of suggestions to help you shape and decorate your biscuits, cookies and brownies as the professionals do.
author: Jane    Price
